title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 09 September 2016 - XWiki
content:
<xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
15:55 <vmassol> hi xwikibot! welcome back :)  
15:55 <vmassol> we missed you  
15:55 <tmortagne> bezourox: what do you get ?  
15:55 <bezourox> usr/local/java//bin/java -Djava.util.logging.config.file=/var/lib/tomcat7/conf/logging.properties -Djava.util.logging.manager=org.apache.juli.ClassLoaderLogManager -Djava.awt.headless=true -Xmx1024m -XX:MaxPermSize=192m -Djava.endorsed.dirs=/usr/share/tomcat7/endorsed -classpath /usr/share/tomcat7/bin/bootstrap.jar:/usr/share/tomcat7/bin/tomcat-juli.jar -Dcatalina.base=/var/lib/tomcat7 -Dcatalina.home=/usr/share/tomcat7 -Djava.io.tmp  
15:55 <tmortagne> hmm wait  
15:56 <vmassol> ok bot is working, logging is on: http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/IRC/xwikiArchive20160909  
15:56 <vmassol> :)  
15:56 <vmassol> I really need to fix those "An error occurred while executing Wiki IRC Bot Listener [dev:IRC.LoggingBotListener]. Check your server logs." which we get when there are too many save too fast (by using some memory buffer for example)  
15:56 <tmortagne> bezourox: yes looks good (MaxPermSize is not needed anymore with Java 8 so you can remove it)  
15:57 <bezourox> ok I remove It  
15:57 <tmortagne> I don't understand  
15:58 <tmortagne> could you copy the new complete error you get  
16:01 <mflorea> has quit  
16:05 <DarkKnightCZ> has joined #xwiki  
16:07 <bezourox> tmortagne: http://pastebin.com/qiuYMZ7i  
16:09 <tmortagne> bezourox: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: org.hsqldb.jdbcDriver  
16:09 <tmortagne> looks like you modified hibernate configuration  
16:09 <DarkKnightCZ> has quit  
16:11 <bezourox> hum strange  
16:12 <tmortagne> /etc/xwiki/hibernate.cfg.xml  
16:12 <tmortagne> you install mysql or pgsql package ?  
16:12 <tmortagne> \*installed  
16:13 <bezourox> -rw-r--r-- 1 root root 12223 juil. 29 17:23 hibernate.cfg.xml  
16:13 <bezourox> mysql  
16:13 <bezourox> I installed manually  
16:13 <tmortagne> ha ok, I tough you installed from the debian packages, don't know why  
16:13 <bezourox> seprate java8 + tomcat 7  
16:13 <bezourox> because I was my first test  
16:13 <tmortagne> so you configured your hibernate conf for hsqldb instead of mysql  
16:14 <bezourox> maybe the better solution I think...  
16:14 <bezourox> lol Ok tmortagne  I check de hibernate cfg  
16:15 <tmortagne> the debian package crate the database and the user on mysql and generate the right hibernate conf  
16:15 <bezourox> ok  
16:16 <bezourox> I created DB xwiki with user manually: )  
16:16 <bezourox> Ok uncomment mysql cfg in hibernate.hml  
16:16 <bezourox> restart install  
16:17 <bezourox> same problem.. snif :(  
16:23 <bezourox> hum always same problem : cause mère  org.hibernate.HibernateException: Could not create a DBCP pool. There is an error in the Hibernate configuration file, please review it.  
16:23 <bezourox> very strange  
16:27 <DarkKnightCZ> has joined #xwiki  
16:28 <evalica1> has joined #xwiki  
16:28 <DarkKnightCZ> has quit  
16:30 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
16:32 <evalica> has quit  
16:46 <bezourox> want to cry  
16:51 <vmassol> bezourox: it's pretty simple actually. Just be careful what you edit in the hibernate.cfg.xml. Again paste the gull stack trace if you need help  
16:52 <bezourox> easy when it's not the first time :)  
16:53 <vmassol> paste the error and you'll see it's easy :)  
16:53 <iskorptix> has quit  
16:57 <bezourox> vmassol: http://pastebin.com/0vLQPrAJ  
16:57 <vmassol> "java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: org.hsqldb.jdbcDriver"  
16:57 <vmassol> pretty simple  
16:58 <vmassol> it means you're asking to use HSQLDB but you're not providing the driver jar  
16:58 <vmassol> told'ya!  
16:59 <vmassol> if you want mysql you just need the read the instructions from inside thibernate.cfg.xml and comment/uncomment that's mentioned and/or read http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/AdminGuide/InstallationMySQL  
16:59 <bezourox> hum.. don't understand... poor english  
16:59 <bezourox> I dit it  
16:59 <bezourox> uncomment mysql section  
17:00 <vmassol> and commented the hsqldb one  
17:00 <vmassol> ?  
17:00 <bezourox> maybe bacause it's friday i'm too low  
17:00 <bezourox> yes. commenting this part :  
17:00 <bezourox> <property name="connection.url">jdbc:hsqldb:file:${environment.permanentDirectory}/database/xwiki\_db;shutdown=true</property>     <property name="connection.username">sa</property>     <property name="connection.password"></property>  
17:01 <bezourox> uncomment this part :  
17:01 <bezourox> <property name="connection.url">jdbc:mysql://localhost/xwiki?useSSL=false</property>     <property name="connection.username">xwiki</property>     <property name="connection.password">xwiki</property>     <property name="connection.driver\_class">com.mysql.jdbc.Driver</property>  
17:01 <vmassol> so 2 reasons:  
17:01 <vmassol> - either you didn't comment/uncomment properly  
17:01 <vmassol> - or you're working on the wrong file!  
17:01 <bezourox> hum maybe a problem with jdbc.Driver in /bin but I used .war of xwiki  
17:02 <vmassol> (ie not the one used when run it)  
17:02 <vmassol> I need to work on something else sorry can't spend more time right now  
17:02 <bezourox> VmDevLinux:/var/lib/tomcat7/webapps/xwiki/WEB-INF#  
17:02 <bezourox> Ok no problem thanks for your help !  
17:25 <Pbas> has quit  
17:34 <tmortagne> bezourox: note that XWiki WAR does not wome with mysql connector to you will need to add it too  
17:35 <tmortagne> you should probably take a look at http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/AdminGuide/InstallationMySQL  
17:36 <acotiuga> has quit  
17:38 <tmortagne> maybe you should move to Debian packages (even if it's always a good idea to looks at how it's really working)  
18:04 <mflorea> has quit  
18:41 <kauro[m]> has joined #xwiki  
18:45 <kauro[m]> has left #xwiki  
18:47 <vmassol> evalica1: hi  
18:47 <vmassol> I think there are some errors  
18:47 <vmassol> the contributor is not ratings  
18:47 <vmassol> it's the flamingo skin, see https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/36f0573c9e8949236cdad77013fc533e6e8a91f2  
18:47 <evalica1> ?  
18:48 <vmassol> it's in platform-flamingo/xwiki-platform-flamingo-skin/src/main/resources/flamingo/contentview.vm  
18:48 <evalica1> that was initially  
18:48 <vmassol> and the version is 6.4M3  
18:48 <evalica1> wait...  
18:48 <evalica1> Ratings inserts themselves  
18:49 <vmassol> actually two contributors not just one, wiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-web/src/main/webapp/templates/contentview.vm  
18:49 <vmassol> the UIXP is not about who uses them  
18:49 <vmassol> it's about where they're defined  
18:50 <evalica1> brb - need to test something  
18:50 <vmassol> it's also contributed by colibri btw  
18:51 <vmassol> so 3 contributors  
18:51 <vmassol> we need to fix the UIXP app to allow more than 1 contributor, we can use commas for now  
18:55 <vmassol> restarting jira  
19:05 <evalica1> colibri is unbundled and on a search I found it only on contentheader.vm in Flamingo, for the last version  
19:05 <evalica1> gtg - bye  
19:05 <vmassol> evalica1: hmm strange I have it in platform  
19:06 <evalica1> the templates have moved around  
19:06 <evalica1> maybe  
19:06 <vmassol> probably some old stuff remaining in my target dir  
19:06 <vmassol> checking  
19:06 <vmassol> yep that was it  
19:06 <vmassol> but still it's contributed there  
19:07 <vmassol> so we should probably mention it  
19:08 <vmassol> I'll finish it  
19:08 <vmassol> go on week end! :)  
19:08 <vmassol> have a good one  
19:09 <evalica1> thanks Vincent - have a nice week-end too  
19:09 <evalica1> has quit  
19:10 <vmassol> I need to find an example  
19:12 <vmassol> found the example  
19:23 <tmortagne> has quit  
19:26 <vmassol> has quit  
20:04 <et09> hi, how do i make xwiki serve at / instead of /xwiki  
20:33 <et09> has quit
